entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are creatures that patrolled the outer trees.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a person who survived and has a talisman against dementors.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who spoke to Harry and announced his death.

entities.name: harry's father's stag
entities.description: Harry's father's stag is an animal that kept guardian in Harry's heart.

relationships.description: Dementors patrolled the outer trees where Harry stood.
Voldemort announced Harry's death to him.
